aboutText: I enjoy building apps in my free time when I'm not doing much. Looking to get into machine learning and trying to automate as many things as possible. Love to encourage new coders that they can do it too! I'm not very smart, just curious to see how things work. I'm also not that good of a writer as you can see. lol. Anyways, you are free to download any of the code thats on my github! And I hope you have a great day!

apps.name: Fasting App
apps.description: One day my friend and I were eating at a restaurant and she suddenly asked me what an item looks like. I looked up at her an told her I didnt know. Then she told me why dont you make an app where you can see the pictures of food thats on the menu? Then I made Food Vision. :)
